reqs: This section is restricted to students in the Master of Engineering Leadership (MEL) and Master of Health Leadership and Policy (MHLP) programs.
courseName: Analytics and Interpretation for Applied Sciences
description: Relevant measurable metrics of a project; data interpretation techniques; introduction to data visualization; overview of big data and predictive analytics; strategies related to metrics and data, ethical and privacy concerns. Collaboratively delivered with the Faculty of Commerce and Business Administration.
